amendment.description: Amendment sought to apply the one-to-one replacement requirement for units demolished under a HOPE VI grant only to units that are occupied prior to demolition.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-509 to apply the one-to-one replacement requirement for units demolished under a HOPE VI grant only to units that are occupied prior to demolition.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 227 (Roll no. 13).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Neugebauer.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 227 (Roll no. 13).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
